title: Autopilot
description: How much of your life is in your control?James Delmar thought he knew. Until his dreams started coming true and took over his life. Now he must find out if he's willing to do whatever it takes to regain control."Refreshingly Unique""Great Payoff!""A Must Read!"Autopilot is a fast-paced, thought-provoking novel with twists at every turn.
author: Dave Fymbo
